original: Bryggerimaskiner, Malmö, J. M. Voith A-B, Sthlm, A-B Gårdaverken, Gbg, Christian Berner AS o. AS Ikas, Oslo, Oy Christian Berner o. Tkas Oy, Helsingfors, AS Christian Berner, Köpenhamn, led. av styr. f. Isoler. A-B WMB, Gbg. KTjslVLO, RNS:t-OO.
translated: "Brewery machines, Malmö, J. M. Voith A-B, Stockholm, A-B Gårdaverken, Gothenburg, Christian Berner AS and AS Ikas, Oslo, Oy Christian Berner and Tkas Oy, Helsinki, AS Christian Berner, Copenhagen, board member of Insulating A-B WMB, Gothenburg. Married in 18XX. Received the Knight's Cross of the Order of the Sword and the Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav."

award.name: Knight's Cross of the Order of the Sword
Royal Norwegian Order of St. Olav
